pullrequest.title: Fix for roscpp dependency error and depend on gazebo at runtime.

content.raw: re `gazebo` vs `gazebo8` with the 00-gazebo8.list rosdep sources installed both resolve to libgazebo8-dev. The other gazebo keys are all numberless. I could see numbering this one being useful for causing package installation failures if someone runs `rosdep install` without first doing the rosdep setup but it also makes it confusing when adding new dependencies to determine whether gazebo or gazebo8 should be used. :shrug:
content.html: re gazebo vs gazebo8 with the 00-gazebo8.list rosdep sources installed both resolve to libgazebo8-dev. The other gazebo keys are all numberless. I could see numbering this one being useful for causing package installation failures if someone runs rosdep install without first doing the rosdep setup but it also makes it confusing when adding new dependencies to determine whether gazebo or gazebo8 should be used.
